Module frogger
Package frogger.view

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • frogger.view.GameView
  • public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object

    GameView

    The GameView class is used to paint a Map to a Pane

    Besides, this class also create home, restart and instruction button and score label to make the view more meaningful and functioning.

    Main Functionality 

                    GameView.drawBakcground();
                GameView.getMap();
                GameView.getBackground();

    Use: 

                    GameView gameView = new GameView(gameLevel);
                GameView.drawBackground();
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wenzheng Shan
    See Also:
    Pane, Button, Label, ProgressBar, Map, GameController, MapFactory

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javafx.scene.layout.Pane background
      The Pane that is expected to be drawn with the map on it
      private javafx.scene.control.Button homeButton
      The home Button that back to the start screen when clicked
      private javafx.scene.control.Button instructionButton
      The instruction Button that show the instruction of game when clicked
      private Map map
      The Map that contains all the objects that will be drawn within Pane
      private javafx.scene.control.ProgressBar progressBar
      The ProgressBar to show the time counter of game
      private javafx.scene.control.Button restartButton
      The restart Button that restart the game when clicked

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameView

        public GameView​(java.lang.String gameLevel)
         throws java.lang.Exception

        Initialize the background, home button, restart button,instruction button and progressBar with the operation of new.

        Create the map by calling MapFactory.createMap(String) based on the given gameLevel String

        Parameters:
        gameLevel - A String represent the gameLevel of current game (e.g., "simpleMode", "NormalMode", "HardMode")
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception An exception from MapReader(String) which refers to the ClassNotFoundException

      • drawHomeButton

        public void drawHomeButton()

        Creates the Button and set the position as well as the action.

        After clicking this button, application will change to start Screen.

        Draws this Button to Pane.

      • drawRestartButton

        public void drawRestartButton()

        Creates the Button and set the position as well as the action.

        After clicking this button, application will restart the game.

        Draws this Button to Pane.

      • drawInstructionButton

        public void drawInstructionButton()

        Creates the Button and set the position as well as the action.

        After clicking this button, application will open the instruction page.

        Draws this Button to Pane.

      • drawProgressBar

        public void drawProgressBar()

        Creates the ProgressBar and set the position and style

        This progressbar will be used to show the remaining time of game and after the remaining time is zero, the game ends.
